channel.title: Make stackable?
channel.description: how would i make an item stackable??? i want to make dragon tokens stack in inventory

item.title: Make stackable?
item.dc:creator: @Scaar1 Scaar
item.description:
@Scaar1 wrote:

[quote=“The Tormented, post:2, topic:382466”]i dont know how to make the time stackable fully but i tryed this;

i put this in my class8.java (client sided)

    if(i == ####) //item id

{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aBoolean176 = true;//set to false to make item not stackable
}

i think you have to add the items id somewere else i don’t know. sorry. hope this helped a little…

kind regards

The Tormented
(*RSPS: The Tormented (% complete: 60%) *)[/quote]

When i add it i get errors. anybody else any suggestions?

Read full topic
